thread.title: 18 Valentine's Day Messages for Your News-Obsessed Boo
thread.title_full: 18 Valentine's Day Messages for Your News-Obsessed Boo

title: 18 Valentine's Day Messages for Your News-Obsessed Boo
text:
18 Valentine's Day Messages for Your News-Obsessed Boo Jack Brockway By R. Eric Thomas Feb 14, 2017 
This Valentine's Day, whether you and your boo are closer than General Flynn and the Russian ambassador or you're feeling more ignored than a CNN reporter at a White House press briefing, it's probably hard to think about love with so much happening in the news. So why not do both? If you're having trouble filling out your last minute V-Day card, use one of these 18 newsworthy declarations of love to signal your true intent. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 
I want to hold hands with you for an uncomfortably long time. 
Happy Valentine's Day! Getty 
I wish you and I were Beyoncé's twins so we could spend months hanging out together in very close proximity to Beyoncé. 
Happy Valentine's Bey!
